name: Timothy Cowles
text: I ordered while at work two nights ago and they delivered...great food.. now two days later they won't/changed their delivery area...

name: Laquesha Bailey
text: There chicken is usually good but this visit it was very fatty and not easy to chew. Next time I'll just stick to pizza

name: Tina Sweet
text: Personal pan pizza not done. All they can do is make a new one or give me credit. I do not trust these people with my food. I've waisted my money and time. No apology or refund.

name: Nichole Anita
text: The service was wonderful.  The people there are so nice.  The taco pizza I ordered however was sub par.   It could have just been me but the meat was crunchy and the lettuce was wilted.  Next time I know to ask for the lettuce and tomato on the side.

name: Jackie Ritsema
text: I love this pizza hut! All employees are so kind and the food is always perfect!

name: Siscjke Kennedy
text: Personal pan great could have a few more mushrooms though, fast service

name: Lindsey Jayle Hysell Bonge
text: Some love it some hate it I love pizza hut. I like consistently in knowing what I order from any pizza hut will be as expected

name: Sebastian Stoner
text: Some Pizza Hits I'm no big fan of becuase of there Suace but this on In particular, Changed my mind About pizza Hut forever Absolutely Delicious, Highly recommended.

name: Tom Anderson
text: Great service nice friendly people, and the pizza is good.  Boneless wings are great, and the fries have to be the best in town.

name: Jordan Viper
text: Dinner box was hot and the women behind the counter was very nice ;)

name: Curtiss Carlson
text: Pizza was delicious and done when I was informed it would be.

name: Rosalinda Leyton
text: We just got the cheese bread, I have never had bread this perfect! We are blown away how amazing it is, wish I could share a picture

name: Christinal Graham jefferson
text: The boneless wings were the best

name: Pete Norman
text: Good pizza, good customer service, and great prices.  Much better than the other pizza places in the area.

text: So it's quite different now that they are at a different location; for those of you that have not been to the new location on Henry st. You do not have a server anymore.(except to only bring your pizza, etc. to your table.) You stand in â€¦More

name: Kevyn Aguilera
text: Some of the best pizza I have eaten. I ordered online twice recently and the website is easy to use and they have a huge variety. Both times the person who delivered my pizzas was extremely kind and friendly.

name: Tanner Boyd
text: The slowest fast food pizza restaurant Iâ€™ve been at in my life. I donâ€™t know how an establishment like this can be kept running. They should start paying customers for wait time.

text: Ordered 2 Hawaiian pizzas. They were nothing like they used to be that was just one disappointment. They don't even use the glasses or the plates like they used to have and they didn't have the shakers on the tables. Things like that make a big difference especially when you have 4 littles with you.

text: I love there cheese bread sticks!!!

text: The pizza don't have much flavor at all, and was very greasy. I was planning on ordering from Domino's but decided to do pizza but since it was closer. I regret that now. This was my lunch at work :(

text: I went there today to get some pizza for dinner and they didn't have gloves on Loose Hair were slow and didn't have all their proper ingredients and one of the prep ladies was chewing her nails.

text: Well it's not a 5 star place if I could i would give it 3 1/2 stars but the waitress made us wait like 30 minutes and the pizza I ordered is taking forever I am still waiting and its about 2:47pm I came in at 2:15pm this is taking forever & â€¦More

name: Emily Pfromm
text: Beautiful building, friendly staff and delicious food! Atmosphere is cozy and chic, tvs have kids programs and sports, plus all their food options - there really is something for everyone!

name: Greg Wade
text: I miss the dining room.  There is a serious lack of pizza joint dining rooms these days.  The new location has tables, but you order at a counter and get your pizza in a box.  What a waste of cardboard.

name: Benjamin Gannon
text: Great food recipe hasnt changed

name: Kerry Coleman
text: There is nothing better than getting your pizza fresh out of the oven. Unfortunately that was not the case last night when I arrived at Pizza Hut at 7:25 pm to pick up the pizza  I ordered for pick up at 7:30 pm.  I placed the order online â€¦More

name: Dave falcon
text: I have given the hut a lot of second chances, but today will be the last time I eat there food. Toppings on pizza were wrong, under cooked and little cheese. Cheese sticks burnt with little cheese. Ongoing problems at the Muskegon location.

name: Phenix9551
text: Food was good very nice and nothing was over or under cooked it was all made just right with a reasonable price

name: Brenda Leonard
text: Best taco pizza around....thin crust...beef...extra veggies....the best!

name: Anthony Conklin
text: Very bad Sunday lunch.  I could tell as soon as I pulled up the garbage can outside the door was overflowing now this place has not even been open for an hour when I walked in the dirty tables three than accounted we sat down and and we â€¦More

text: U can tell they down sized bigtime. But good food good service!

text: If I could give a zero I would! Customer service is awful, I wasnâ€™t greeted entering nor was I leaving. Would not spend my money here ever again.

text: Horrible service. Went there and they got everything all wrong, all the employees were really rude when our group was just trying to be understanding to them. We got nothing but attitude. And to top it all off we left and when we got back â€¦More

text: Had an order for delivery today and it was on time and the driver brought cups, plates, and plenty of grated cheese and crushed red pepper seasoning packets without us even asking! Great service.

text: They got my order wrong, but even tho we ate half the pizza, they made us a new pizza free of charge. We dined inside Pizza Hut.

name: Teresa Jones
text: Very poor customer service. It took almost 2 hours to get a 5 item order correct. Waitress yelled across the room to see if we needed anything. I would not recommend this Pizza Hut ever.

I  ordered the large Five Meats pizza

text: Hippie guy with long hair and no hair net, looked like he hasn't bathed in days. Didn't seat us, there wasn't a single soul in the place, however we stood there being ignored for a few minutes so we decided to just leave. Won't be going back!

name: Tamir Robertson
text: I left on my break to come across town for some Pizza Hut wings I placed a order before I clocked out for break when I placed the order the guy didn't even ask for a name or number which he should have. I come all the way across town to â€¦More

text: Made a order over $100 dollars which included drinks. Yet they faild to deliver my drinks because somehow it's my fault I didn't ask for my soads before leaving store. ???
